alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NASSAU...CAMDEN... SOUTHWESTERN GLYNN...CENTRAL BRANTLEY...EASTERN WARE AND NORTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodbine, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, Folkston, Woodbine, Nahunta, Kings Bay Base, Homeland, Hickox, and Kings Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
